A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Worst movie I've seen in a longtime. I felt no sense of urgency\, the casino bit was pointless\, in terms of character actions there were a lot of stupid decisions\, and overall the movie dragged on to the point that it felt like a chore to watch.

Only redeeming part of the film would be the bits involving Luke\, Rey\, and Kylo. Unfortunately the idiocy of the film detracted from the positive aspects.

As a Star Wars fan my hopes have been ironically crushed.
